synopsis.text: She lost her memory in an accident, and all that remained was an unyielding desire to sing. The amnesiac Sue finds herself under the care of Torao's family, unaware that she is one-third of a promising band with her twin sisters. As Sue embarks on her arduous journey to stardom, she uncovers her past and reconnects with her sisters, forming an unbreakable bond through music. Inspired by the 1979 novelty disco hit 'Sue Cat Song,' this anime serves as an early example of the Idol genre, featuring Tsuruoka Yayoi's captivating performance as Sue's voice in both dialogue and song. Prepare to be captivated by Sue's inspiring story as she overcomes adversity to claim her place atop the music charts.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
